title.narrative: Handover of Water Apportionment Accord (WAA) Tool to Pakistan

description.narrative: Handover of Water Apportionment Accord (WAA) Tool to Pakistan: The Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation (CSIRO) is an existing provider of Australian water expertise to Pakistan. Through previous funding CSIRO has progressed water reform in Pakistan by creating the only tool available to accurately allocate water between provinces in accordance with intra provincial allocations. This investment will enable the tool to be modified to ensure it can be sustainably handed over and embedded for use by federal and provincial water authorities and institutions in Pakistan.
